hh.name: hh
hh.caption: HH Status
hh.sqlstr: select sum(IFNULL(hc,0)) as hc,sum(IFNULL(wip,0)) as wip,sum(IFNULL(m1,0)) as m1,sum(IFNULL(m2,0)) as m2,sum(IFNULL(m3,0)) as m3,sum(IFNULL(m4,0)) as m4,sum(IFNULL(m5,0)) as m5,sum(IFNULL(m6,0)) as m6,sum(IFNULL(p.hchh100,0)) as hh100,sum(IFNULL(p.hcdtc100,0)) as dtc100,sum(IFNULL(p.hh,0)) as hh,sum(IFNULL(p.ehh,0)) as ehh,sum(IFNULL(p.tpehh,0)) as tpehh,sum(IFNULL(p.ehh,0)) as tehh,sum(IFNULL(p.hh,0)-IFNULL(p.ehh,0)) as uehh,sum((select count(DISTINCT vi.vcid)  from visits vi where vi.vcid=p.vcid and vi.approved='Y')) as eimpact from village_cache p  where ifnull(p.hh,0) >0

hhprogress.name: hhprogress
hhprogress.caption: HH Progress
hhprogress.sqlstr: select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(hp.hpdate, INTERVAL(8-DAYOFWEEK(hp.hpdate)) DAY),'Week#%v-%d-%b-%y') as mday,sum(if(hh.ehh >=hh.hh,1,0)) whc100,sum(IFNULL(hp.hprogress,0)) whh from habitationprogress hp,habitations hh,villages p  where hp.hbid=hh.hbid and ifnull(hh.hh,0) >0 and  hh.vcid=p.vcid   and week(hp.hpdate,1) > week(now(),1)-12 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(hp.hpdate,'%Y-%v') order BY hp.hpdate desc limit 6

maintable.name: maintable
maintable.caption: Electrification Status Sheet
maintable.sqlstr: select gtb.scid as ID,gtb.state as gfield,'' as ue,'' as eue,'' as unue,'' as nfue,'' as bue,count(DISTINCT p.vcid) as vc,sum(IFNULL(hc,0)) as hc,sum(IFNULL(p.hh,0)) as hh,sum(IFNULL(p.ehh,0)) as tehh,sum(IFNULL(p.hh,0)-IFNULL(p.ehh,0)) as uehh,round(sum(IFNULL(p.ehh,0))*100/sum(IFNULL(p.hh,0)),2) as pehh from village_cache p ,states gtb  where ifnull(p.hh,0) >0  and p.scid = gtb.scid  group by p.scid,gfield order by gfield

uepart.name: uepart
uepart.caption: Electrification Progress
uepart.sqlstr:
select sum(visits) as tv,count(*) as count, SUM(if(v.electrified+eegva+engva > 1, 1, 0)) AS e,SUM(if(v.uninhabited =1, 1, 0)) as e4,SUM(if(v.uninhabited =2, 1, 0)) as notfeasible,sum(if(v.electrified+eegva+engva< 2 and v.uninhabited=0, 1, 0)) as uehh,sum(if(v.uninhabited=0 and v.electrified+m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7+m8+m9+m10+m11+m12+eegva+engva=0,1,0)) as s1,sum(if(v.uninhabited=0 and (m1+m2+m3+m4+m5+m6+m7+m8)>0 and (v.electrified+eegva+engva+m9+m10+m11+m12)=0,1,0)) as s3,sum(if(v.uninhabited=0 and v.electrified+eegva+engva
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                <2 and (v.electrified+eegva+engva+m9+m10+m11+m12)>0,1,0)) as s4,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m1,0)+IFNULL(m2,0)+IFNULL(m3,0)+IFNULL(m4,0)+IFNULL(m5,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m1,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m2,0)+IFNULL(m3,0)+IFNULL(m4,0)+IFNULL(m5,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m2,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m3,0)+IFNULL(m4,0)+IFNULL(m5,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m3,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m4,0)+IFNULL(m5,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m4,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m5,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m5,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m6,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m6,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m7,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m7,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m8,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m8,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m9,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m9,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m10,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m10,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m11,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m11,sum(IF (IFNULL(v.electrified,0)+IFNULL(m12,0) >0,1,0)) as m12 from recmobilepms.uevillages v,villages p where v.vcid=p.vcid and IFNULL(v.active,'')='Y'

m2.caption: Receipt of poles in the villages and enroute of villages for 11KV LINE & LT Line

m3.caption: Erection of poles for 11KV line & DTR substation and earthing

m4.caption: Erection of poles for LT line

m5.caption: Receipt of line material including conductor and cable

m8.caption: Receipt of distribution transformer substation at site

m9.caption: Erection of distribution transformer substation equipment (DTR,LTDB,LA,AB switch,cablesmeter,fuse,earthing)

m10.caption: completion of electrification works in village including BPL service connection

m11.caption: Energisation of village including BPL service connection

ueprogress.name: ueprogress
ueprogress.caption: UE Progress
ueprogress.sqlstr: select DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(v.edate, INTERVAL(8-DAYOFWEEK(v.edate)) DAY),'Week#%v-%d-%b-%y') as mday,count(*) as vc from recmobilepms.uevillages v,villages p  where v.vcid=p.vcid and v.electrified+eegva+engva >1 and ISNULL(v.edate)=false and IFNULL(v.active,'')='Y'   and week(v.edate,1) > week(now(),1)-12 GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(v.edate,'%Y-%v') order by v.edate desc limit 6
